author: Odeinoichus
title: Enjoyable Mini Train Build.
review:
Set #30575 Train: This brilliant little model is an excellent addition to the LEGO 2020 Polybags and the Creator LEGO Train Polybags that have been released in the past. This particular model is quite attractive looking reminding me of an old steam locomotive. The colouring is a nice touch too. Let’s discuss the pros and cons real quick and then move on to final thoughts.

Pros:

  • Fun and enjoyable build.
  • Model looks sharp and well designed with proper proportions and decent mobility. Rolls very well.

Cons:

  • Includes a hitch, but no trailer/coal cart to tow.

Overall opinion

This set has surprisingly few cons, it’s fun to build and fun to play with. The only downside I could find was not include a secondary car for the engine to tow, but it was nice that they included the piece so you could make your own as a functional model to add to the play functions of the set. I’d recommend tracking this one down to add it to your collection. Recommended.
